function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglecting the impact of buildings on climate change, resources, and ecosystems","Impact":"Jeopardizing the health and safety of the broader human population","Mitigation":"Re-inventing building codes to consider environmental consequences","Technologies":"Sustainable building technologies, renewable energy systems","People":"Broader human population, communities","Owner":"Government agencies, building departments"},{"Description":"Delay in changing national energy and building codes","Impact":"Regulations governing building carbon reductions lag behind voluntary assessment methods","Mitigation":"Anticipating more stringent carbon reductions to be included in building codes and standards within the coming decade","Technologies":"Energy-efficient building technologies, renewable energy systems","People":"Regulatory bodies, building industry","Owner":"Government agencies, regulatory bodies"}]}
